gir_principles.title: Section/Chapter Notes
gir_principles.title_he: כלל 1 - פירושים לפי הערות הפרקים והסעיפים
gir_principles.description: Classification is determined by the terms of headings and Section/Chapter notes. These are legally binding.
gir_principles.application: Always check Section and Chapter notes FIRST. They override everything else.

gir_principles.title: Incomplete/Unfinished Articles
gir_principles.title_he: כלל 2א - פריטים לא שלמים או לא גמורים
gir_principles.description: Incomplete or unfinished articles are classified as the complete article if they have its essential character.
gir_principles.application: An unassembled bicycle is still classified as a bicycle (8712), not as parts.

gir_principles.title: Mixtures and Combinations
gir_principles.description: Mixtures and combinations of materials are classified per GIR 3.
gir_principles.application: A product made of plastic and metal — determine which material gives essential character.

gir_principles.title: Most Specific Description
gir_principles.description: When two or more headings apply, the most specific description wins.
gir_principles.application: Electric razor (8510) is more specific than 'electrical machinery' (8509).

gir_principles.title: Essential Character
gir_principles.description: Mixtures, composite goods, and sets are classified by the component giving essential character.
gir_principles.application: A gift set with perfume and soap — perfume gives essential character → 3303.

gir_principles.title: Last in Numerical Order
gir_principles.description: When 3a and 3b fail, classify under the last heading in numerical order.
gir_principles.application: Rare fallback rule. Used when essential character cannot be determined.

gir_principles.title: Most Akin
gir_principles.description: Goods that cannot be classified under GIR 1-3 are classified under the heading for the most similar goods.
gir_principles.application: Novel products not yet in the tariff — find the closest match.

gir_principles.title: Cases and Containers
gir_principles.description: Containers specially shaped for specific articles are classified with the article.
gir_principles.application: A violin case presented with the violin → classified as violin (9202).

gir_principles.title: Packing Materials
gir_principles.description: Packing materials are classified with the goods unless they are clearly reusable.
gir_principles.application: Cardboard box around electronics → classified with the electronics.

gir_principles.title: Subheading Classification
gir_principles.description: Classification at subheading level follows the same principles, comparing subheadings at the same level.
gir_principles.application: After determining the 4-digit heading, apply GIR 1-5 again at the 6/8/10 digit level.

gir_principles.title: Israeli 10-digit Format
gir_principles.description: Israeli tariff uses XX.XX.XXXXXX format (10 digits). Last 2-4 digits are national subdivisions.
gir_principles.application: International HS is 6 digits. Israel adds 4 national digits for duty rate differentiation.

keyword_patterns.notes: Check if extruded (7604) or structural assembly (7610)

keyword_patterns.description: Telephone sets and other apparatus for transmission of voice/data
keyword_patterns.notes: Smartphones under 8517.13. Needs MOC type approval.

keyword_patterns.pattern: LED light|LED lamp|תאורת LED|נורת LED|מנורת LED
keyword_patterns.notes: LED modules may be 8541. Complete luminaires are 9405. Check if module or fixture.
Check power rating for exact subheading
Virgin (1509.10) vs refined (1509.90). High duty rate.
Kosher certification needed for retail. Purchase tax applies.

keyword_patterns.description: Parts and accessories for motor vehicles
keyword_patterns.notes: Very broad heading. Check if the part has its own specific heading first.

keyword_patterns.description: Articles for conveyance or packing of goods, of plastics
keyword_patterns.notes: Plastic bag tax may apply for consumer bags

keyword_patterns.description: Tubes, pipes and hollow profiles of iron or steel
keyword_patterns.notes: Seamless (7304) vs welded (7306). Check for anti-dumping duties.
Must meet SI 562 safety standard. Age marking required.

keyword_patterns.description: Instruments and appliances used in medical sciences
keyword_patterns.notes: AMAR registration required. Risk class determines process.

keyword_patterns.description: Woven fabrics of synthetic filament yarn
keyword_patterns.notes: Very broad. Fiber composition determines heading (52=cotton, 54=synthetic, 55=staple).
MOH notification required. INCI labeling. Distinguish from pharmaceutical (30).
